name: Captain Reylia Stormwave
title: Innkeeper & Barkeep
description: A boisterous dragonborn sea captain who runs The Salty Anchor with the energy of a storm. She loves loud music, strong drinks, and the company of sailors and adventurers from distant lands.

greeting.first_time: Ahoy! Welcome to The Salty Anchor! I'm Captain Reylia Stormwave. We've got cold beer, warm beds, and the loudest, rowdiest music in the harbor! What brings ye here, sailor?
greeting.returning: Back again, are ye? What'll it be today?
greeting.tired: Ye look like ye been through a storm! Get yerself a room and some rest!

sleeping.text: *snoring like waves crashing* Zzz... *grumbles* ...full sails ahead... Zzz...

off_duty.text: Just checkin' the rigging! The tavern's open—help yerself below deck!

main_menu.text: What can I do for ye, sailor?

buy_drink.text: Best beer this side of the ocean, brewed strong like the sea! Take a look!

ask_rent_room.text: A hammock for the night costs 50 gold. Sleeps like ye're rockin' on the waves! Want it?

confirm_rent_room.success: Aye! Yer hammock's ready below deck. Sleep well, sailor!
confirm_rent_room.failure: Ye need 50 gold for a room. Come back when ye got the coin!

ask_about_shows.text: Every night at 9 PM, we have the loudest music in the harbor! Sea shanties, drums, horns—music that carries over the waves! Ye need yer instruments and book before 8 PM. Want to see what's on tonight?

see_available_shows.text: Let's see what we got lined up...
